mosinstall.name: mfTechnoratiChart
mosinstall.author: Marcofolio.net
mosinstall.description:
Show off your Technorati blog reactions in a beautiful chart.

Make sure you enter the correct URL to your blog in the module settings without the http:// part.

Support

Please visit Marcofolio.net and leave me a message.

Version 1.0, 2008

Don't forget to publish this module!

param.name: blogurl
param.label: Blog URL
param.description: URL of your blog WITHOUT http://.

param.name: width
param.label: Width (px)
param.description: Width of the Technorati Chart in pixels.

param.name: height
param.label: Height (px)
param.description: Height of the Technorati Chart in pixels.

param.name: nrdays
param.label: Number of Days
param.description: Set the number of days to be displayed.

param.name: blogreactions
param.label: Link to blog reactions
param.description: Link the chart to your Technorati Blog Reactions.

param.name: link
param.label: Link
param.description: URL to redirect to when chart image is clicked on. Only works when Link to Blog reactions is set to No.
